pyTest:
def test_binary_search(self):
        self.assertEqual(binary_search([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 3), 2)
        self.assertEqual(binary_search([1, 3, 5, 7, 9], 7), 3)
        self.assertEqual(binary_search([1, 3, 5, 7, 9], 6), -1)
        self.assertEqual(binary_search([], 1), -1)
